content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to specific information about your location. However, there are a few ways you can find astrophotography workshops in your area:

1. Search online: You can search online for astrophotography workshops in your area. Try searching for phrases like "astrophotography workshops near me" or "astronomy clubs near me."

2. Check local astronomy clubs and groups: Many astronomy clubs and groups offer astrophotography workshops and events. You can check their websites or social media pages to find out if they have any upcoming workshops.

3. Visit your local observatory or planetarium: Many observatories and planetariums offer workshops and classes on astrophotography. You can check their websites or give them a call to find out if they have any upcoming events.

4. Attend astronomy events: Attending events like star parties or astronomy festivals can be a great way to network with other astrophotographers and find out about upcoming workshops.

By taking a proactive approach and seeking out learning opportunities, you may be surprised at what you can achieve in astrophotography. Good luck!
